msg: These are the Glassbeam Analytics apps available for your organization.

All dashboards/reports (created by users of Glassbeam using Workbench, or created by the Professional Services team of Glassbeam as custom dashboards) are listed under the Dashboards tab.

Each dashboard contains panels, each of which contains visualizations such as charts, tables, lists.
This option provides information on all the Glassbeam Analytics hosts available for your organization.

A username and password is provided to access Glassbeam Analytics.

Here you can change the default password, access the Administrator Console, know the log parsing status, and log out of the application.
Use this option to add descriptive tags all the selected reports.

Click here to filter data based on values of the following columns:

  • Name
  • Type
  • Owner
  • Data Sources
  • Last Modified
  • Tags (Only if at least one of the dashboards has been tagged)

Choose between types of dashboards available in Glassbeam Analytics:

  • All - Lists all the Dashboards (internal and User created).
  • Internal - Lists Dashboards created by Glassbeam Professional Services.
  • User created - Lists Dashboards created using Workbench App.

Add tags to the selected dashboards

Select dashboards and add tag.
Filter by dashboard created by.
Filter by dashboard's data sources.
Click here to expand the accessibility of the selected dashboards to the selected roles.

Click here to edit multiple dashboards and update the following in bulk:

  • Dashboard Owner
  • Visibility (Public/Private)
Click here to list all the users corresponding to the assigned roles for the selected dashboards.
Switch to list view.
Switch thumbnail view.
Select a dashboard.
Click to Change Owner
Click to Change visibility to Public
Click to Change visibility to Private
Click here to toggle between public and private.
Click here to view the list of roles that can view the dashboard.
Click to show all tabs for this dashboard.
Click to delete this dashboard.
Click to delete this tag.
Option to change the number of Dashboards you want to display.
Control pagination from this area.
